thread.title: Bite out of Sandwich Leads Man to Barricade Himself in House
thread.title_full: Bite out of Sandwich Leads Man to Barricade Himself in House

author: ezdelesa
title: Bite out of Sandwich Leads Man to Barricade Himself in House
text:
Bite out of Sandwich Leads Man to Barricade Himself in House January 9, 2017 3:09 PM Filed Under: maryland barricade Photo Credit: Thinkstock 
DUNDALK, Md. — A stolen bite out of his grilled cheese sandwich led a Maryland man to fire a shot inside his house and barricade himself for hours. Dundalk standoff has ended. Police say the suspect surrendered peacefully — he was upset someone bit into his grilled cheese sandwich #WBAL 
— Vanessa Herring (@VanessaWBAL) January 9, 2017 
Baltimore County police spokesman Shawn Vinson says the dispute began about 5 p.m. Sunday at a Dundalk home. He says the man was eating with his wife and daughter, and became angry when one of them took a bite from his sandwich, prompting him to fire a shot inside the house. 
The wife and daughter were able to safely leave the house, but the man barricaded himself inside. He surrendered peacefully shortly before 9 p.m. 
No one was injured. 
Police took the man to a hospital for an evaluation. Vinson says the man will face charges.
